document.discussion_title: Shares of Charter Communications up nearly 3%
document.topic_text: Shares of Charter Communications up nearly 3% 3 min ago 2:53 p.m. April 25, 2016 - Trey Williams 8:34 a.m. April 22, 2016 - Trey Williams 5:53 p.m. April 20, 2016 - Shalini Ramachandran Charter Communications stock price target raised to $250 from $220 at UBS 9:29 a.m. March 29, 2016 - Tomi Kilgore 8:47 a.m. March 4, 2016 - Trey Williams 10:48 a.m. Feb. 29, 2016 - John D. McKinnon Charter Communications upgraded to overweight from neutral at J.P. Morgan 10:08 a.m. Feb. 25, 2016 - Tomi Kilgore 9:51 a.m. Feb. 4, 2016 - MarketWatch.com 9:19 a.m. Feb. 4, 2016 - Caitlin Huston Charter Communications Q4 revenue $2.51 billion vs. $2.36 billion; FactSet consensus $2.52 billion 9:10 a.m. Feb. 4, 2016 - Caitlin Huston Charter Communications Q4 FactSet consensus: loss per share of 18 cents 9:09 a.m. Feb. 4, 2016 - Caitlin Huston Charter Communications Q4 loss per share $1.09 vs. loss of 44 cents 9:07 a.m. Feb. 4, 2016 - Caitlin Huston 1:27 p.m. Jan. 28, 2016 - MarketWatch.com 7:53 a.m. Jan. 28, 2016 - MarketWatch.com 6:34 p.m. Jan. 8, 2016 - Sue Chang 10:24 a.m. Dec. 29, 2015 - Wallace Witkowski 12:28 p.m. Dec. 21, 2015 - Benjamin Gomes-Casseres 2:53 p.m. Dec. 4, 2015 - William Watts 3:00 p.m. Nov. 16, 2015 - MarketWatch.com Charter Communications started at buy with $242 stock price target at SunTrust Robinson Humphrey 8:15 a.m. Nov. 11, 2015 - Tomi Kilgore
